metadata.description: Strategic brand building skills for Claude Code. Create Brand DNA frameworks through guided workshops, audit existing brands, generate stakeholder presentations, voice samples, social media bios, and comprehensive brand books.

plugins.name: brand-skills
plugins.description: Brand DNA framework with 5 modes: guided workshop, direct creation, brand audit, voice samples, and competitive positioning. Outputs include presentations, executive summaries, PDF brand books, and social media bios.
